plot: In the aftermath of 9/11, an Arab-American man finds himself the victim of a hate crime which leads to murder. His only hope is an attorney who has limited time and evidence to build a case.
title: Land of the Free
plot_es: In the aftermath of 9/11, an Arab-American man finds himself the victim of a hate crime which leads to murder. His only hope is an attorney who has limited time and evidence to build a case.
plot_en: In the aftermath of 9/11, an Arab-American man finds himself the victim of a hate crime which leads to murder. His only hope is an attorney who has limited time and evidence to build a case.
